Class TestDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.game.cardgame.TestDeck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeckIntfc

    public class TestDeck
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeckIntfc
    Title: TestDeck.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: A Standard Playing Card Deck built with options from an options Map

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 17, 2016

    updates:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestDeck()
      default constructor builds a TestDeck with no Jokers
      TestDeck(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
      convenience constructor allows us to pass an options Map and build Deck using options from the Map

      remove a specific Card from the Deck (remove from Deck, inUse and discards)
      void shuffle()
      shuffle the Deck - Does NOT include Cards from discards pile - run addDiscards() first to include discarded Cards in shuffle
